messages.message:
Sr. Systems Engineer Position

Dear Brian, 

My name is Kelsey and I’m a Technical Recruiter with Apex Systems. I came across your online resume and wanted to reach out to you to see if you were on the job market. I have a Sr. Systems Engineer position with a large client in Chandler, AZ and you appear to be a perfect fit for what the manager is looking for. Please give me a call at 480-368-2480 or email me directly at kmetzler@apexsystemsinc.com. I am looking forward to hearing from you!

Required Skill Set/Experience:
•	5+ years of experience in security applications and systems
•	Advanced technical proficiency with Windows/Unix Server/Infrastructure systems administration, engineering and support
•	Intermediate to advanced capability with Windows/Unix/DB scripting and server/application process automation
•	Advanced problem solving and technical troubleshooting capabilities
•	Must be organized and have rigorous attention to detail
•	Proven written and verbal communication skills with both Business/Management and Technical/Engineering resources
•	Ability to work effectively under aggressive timelines

Kelsey Metzler
kmetzler@apexsystemsinc.com
I promise to keep you in the loop.

Application Engineer

Dear Brian, 

My name is Kelsey and I’m a Technical Recruiter with Apex Systems. I came across your online resume and wanted to reach out to you to see if you were on the job market. I have an Application Engineer position with a large client in Chandler, AZ and you appear to be a perfect fit for what the manager is looking for. If you are open to exploring a new role at this time, please feel free to contact me at your earliest convenience and we can discuss this position further. If you are not on the job market, but know someone who has a similar background and experience, please feel free to pass my contact information along. Apex does offer a referral incentive!

Kelsey Metzler
kmetzler@apexsystemsinc.com
480-368-2480

Hi Brian,

No the position is with Wells Fargo.
Thank you for thinking of me but I don't want to work for a company full of fraud.
